typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ITEM_NBR as string,
		DEPT_NBR as string,
		ITEM_STATUS_CODE as string,
		CREATED_USERID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FILE_NAME',
	wildcardPaths:['migrated_items.csv']) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		ITEM_NUMBER = ITEM_NBR,
		DEPT_NUMBER = DEPT_NBR,
		ITEM_STATUS = ITEM_STATUS_CODE,
		CREATED_BY = CREATED_USERID,
		FILE_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sort(asc(ITEM_NUMBER, true),
	desc(DEPT_NUMBER, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 aggregate(groupBy(ITEM_STATUS)) ~> Aggregate1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'NewOutput.txt',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ITEM_NUMBER,
		DEPT_NUMBER,
		ITEM_STATUS,
		CREATED_BY,
		FILE_NAME
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AggregatedOutput.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
